name: LingeriePlanet.com
overview:
LingeriePlanet.com is a e-commerce website developed with the goal of sourcing and selling the best lingerie via a high-traffic ecommerce website. The business is Family-Owned and operated.

Founder/Owner Eric Melin has 13 years experience in the online marketing & e-commerce space where he’s worked with numerous leading e-tail clients including: Marriott International (NYSE:MAR), Theatre.com, Liberty Medical (NASDAQ:PLMD), batteries.com, TaylorGifts, Starwood Hotels (NYSE:HOT), Broadway.com, Intelli-check (NASDAQ:IDN), Coinland.com, Victoria Secret, United Site Services, Inc., Ace Tickets, Etronics.com, binoculars.com, Baby Toytown, Inc., 1800PetMeds (NASDAQ: PETS).

LingeriePlanet.com was launched in early 2011 as a spin off founder Eric Melin’s web consulting company. One of first clients of the consulting company dates way back in 1999 - Victoria Secret had hired team of web developers to build the first www.VictoriaSecret.com Lingerie Websites. Eric since built and sold a SEM/SEO Agency (Search Engine Optimization, Search Engine Marketing) in the Boston Area which serviced dozens of small businesses and Fortune 500 clientele. He also is Principle Business broker of 909brokers.com which helps small “main street” business owners buy and sell their businesses. Eric has founded numerous web businesses and has been VP in a $8M Series-A Venture-Backed Startup and as VP in leading e-commerce & e-retail company.
